plays.text: Penalty to Slava Kozlov 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)

Penalty to Andy Sutton 2 minutes for Roughing Tie Domi
Penalty to Aki Berg 2 minutes for Holding Per Svartvadet
Penalty to Ilya Kovalchuk 2 minutes for Roughing Robert Reichel
Goal scored by Brad Tapper assisted by Ilya Kovalchuk and Patrik Stefan
